passage_text: Karen McGill Nurse Unit Manager, Nambour The colleagues I work with at Nambour Hospital make work life enjoyable. Life on the Sunshine Coast is like being on holidays.
Nambour General Hospital is the largest regional public hospital in Queensland servicing the entire Sunshine Coast. Selangor Private Hospital is also located in Nambour.

Location: 106km north Brisbane. About Nambour. Nambour is a major regional town located in the west of the Sunshine Coast. Nambour has grown to become a significant agricultural centre producing a variety of tropical crops including macadamia nuts, bananas, citrus fruits, pineapple and sugar.

Capital works or recent improvements. Nambour General Hospital is a large regional public hospital in Queensland, with the most recent addition to services being the commissioning of the state of the art Procedural Suites and a Cardiac Catheter Laboratory.

To provide the patients of the Sunshine Coast Hospital and Health Service with best practice pharmaceutical care in accordance with their needs and the policies... 21 days ago-save job-email-more... 1  View all Queensland Government jobs-Sunshine Coast jobs. 2  Learn more about working at Queensland Government.

Rehabilitation-Nambour. Nambour Selangor Private Hospital Rehabilitation Unit provides excellence in multidisciplinary, patient focussed care through the use of a holistic approach. Our aim is to help each patient optimise his or her health and functional independence.

A new tertiary Sunshine Coast University Hospital (SCUH) at Kawana will open with 450 beds in 2016 and expand to a 738 bed facility by 2021. SCUH will offer a range of new and expanded services for the Sunshine Coast, including a Skills, Academic and Research Centre on the site. Living in Nambour.
